mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ADS_MODEL_CHECK_ITEM T where 1 = 1 AND T.DEL_FLAG != 'Y'
AND lower(T.NAME) like '%' || lower(trim(#{name})) ||'%'

select t.* from (select tmp.*, rownum rn from (select a.id,b.NAME from ADS_MODEL_OBJECT_ITEM_MAPPING a,ADS_MODEL_CHECK_ITEM b where 1 = 1 AND a.DEL_FLAG != 'Y' AND b.id = a.ITEM_ID AND a.OBJECT_ID = #{objectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND lower(b.NAME) like '%' || lower(trim(#{name})) ||'%'
order by b.update_time desc, b.create_time desc，b.id desc) tmp
where rownum <= #{pageSize}*#{pageNum}) t where t.rn >= 1+#{pageSize}*(#{pageNum}-1)

SELECT COUNT(1) from ADS_MODEL_OBJECT_ITEM_MAPPING a,ADS_MODEL_CHECK_ITEM b where 1 = 1 AND a.DEL_FLAG != 'Y' AND b.id = a.ITEM_ID AND a.OBJECT_ID = #{objectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND lower(b.NAME) like '%' || lower(trim(#{name})) ||'%'

select t.* from (select tmp.*, rownum rn from (select ID, NAME from ADS_MODEL_CHECK_ITEM where 1 = 1 AND DEL_FLAG != 'Y' AND ID NOT IN (SELECT ITEM_ID FROM ADS_MODEL_OBJECT_ITEM_MAPPING where 1 = 1 AND DEL_FLAG != 'Y' AND OBJECT_ID = #{objectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
AND lower(NAME) like '%' || lower(trim(#{name})) ||'%'
order by update_time desc, create_time desc，id desc) tmp
where rownum <= #{pageSize}*#{pageNum}) t where t.rn >= 1+#{pageSize}*(#{pageNum}-1)

SELECT COUNT(1) from ADS_MODEL_CHECK_ITEM where 1 = 1 AND DEL_FLAG != 'Y' AND ID NOT IN (SELECT ITEM_ID FROM ADS_MODEL_OBJECT_ITEM_MAPPING where 1 = 1 AND DEL_FLAG != 'Y' AND OBJECT_ID = #{objectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
AND lower(NAME) like '%' || lower(trim(#{name})) ||'%'

select a.id, a.standard_id as standardId, a.name, c.value as standardValue from ads_model_check_item a, ads_model_object_item_mapping b, ads_model_check_standard c where a.id = b.item_id and b.object_id = #{object_id} and b.del_flag != 'Y' and a.del_flag != 'Y' and c.del_flag != 'Y' and a.standard_id = c.id

select distinct d.id, d.standard_id as standardId, d.name, f.value as standardValue from ads_check_model a, ads_model_attribute_mapping b, ads_model_check_object c, ads_model_check_item d, ads_model_object_item_mapping e, ads_model_check_standard f where a.id = #{model_id} and a.id = b.model_id and b.type = 'CHECK_OBJECT' and b.del_flag != 'Y' and a.del_flag != 'Y' and c.del_flag != 'Y' and d.del_flag != 'Y' and e.del_flag != 'Y' and f.del_flag != 'Y' and c.id = b.object_id and e.object_id = c.id and e.item_id = d.id and f.id = d.standard_id

select count(distinct d.id) from ads_check_model a, ads_model_attribute_mapping b, ads_model_check_object c, ads_model_check_item d, ads_model_object_item_mapping e, ads_model_check_standard f where a.id = #{model_id} and a.id = b.model_id and b.type = 'CHECK_OBJECT' and b.del_flag != 'Y' and a.del_flag != 'Y' and c.del_flag != 'Y' and d.del_flag != 'Y' and e.del_flag != 'Y' and f.del_flag != 'Y' and c.id = b.object_id and e.object_id = c.id and e.item_id = d.id and f.id = d.standard_id
select i.ID , i.STANDARD_ID , i.NAME from ADS_MODEL_CHECK_ITEM i where i.ID IN ( select m.ITEM_ID from ADS_MODEL_OBJECT_ITEM_MAPPING m WHERE m.OBJECT_ID = #{objId})
